subject: Baseball
Medicine and Health
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Mel Stottlemyre returned to the major leagues last week as the pitching coach of the Seattle Mariners, accepting the first of what he hopes is a series of one-year contracts.
snippet: Mel Stottlemyre returned to the major leagues last week as the pitching coach of the Seattle Mariners, accepting the first of what he hopes is a series of one-year contracts.
